Dialogue: Ugh. What am I going to do?!
The world is ending today and I still haven't confessed my love to Lily!
I should be telling her how I really feel right now . . .
But I can't just go over to her empty handed!
You gotta help me, please! Could you find me some roses or something?
There has to be some nice ones up north of the town.
I would go there myself but I need figure to out what I'm going to say.
I should write a note . . . love from James . . .
. . . Not like it will matter after today.
Anyways, thanks man you really did me a huge favor here.
I'm finally prepared to confess my love to her.
Is it even worth telling Lily how I feel with only a day left on Earth?
On the other hand, what's the worst thing that could happen?
You're right! The worst thing is already happening!
That settles it. Once you find some roses and I write out my thoughts, I'll go find her.
